thread.title: Bergen rebuts claims that Obama lied about bin Laden - CNN Video
thread.title_full: Bergen rebuts claims that Obama lied about bin Laden - CNN Video

title: Bergen rebuts claims that Obama lied about bin Laden - CNN Video
text: Report accuses Obama of lying about bin Laden killing By Alexandra Jaffe, CNN Journalist Seymour Hersh is alleging President Barack Obama and his administration lied about the circumstances surrounding the 2011 killing of Osama bin Laden, an account close followers of the raid to kill the al Qaeda leader are aggressively disputing. Was the bin Laden killing story a lie? By Peter Bergen, CNN National Security Analyst Seymour Hersh is one of the giants of investigative journalism. Early in his career he broke the story of the My Lai massacre during which hundreds of unarmed civilians were killed by U.S. soldiers in Vietnam in 1968. More from World
